page.name: THEME
page.Resource:
<style type="text/css">
      #yaf_digest
      {
      font-family: arial,helvetica,"lucida grande",verdana,sans-serif;
      font-size: 9.5pt;
      color: #333333;
      background-color: #eee;
      }

      #yaf_digest a:link {
      color:#105CB6;
      text-decoration:none;
      }

      #yaf_digest a {
      color:#105CB6;
      text-decoration:none;
      }

      #yaf_digest h1
      {
      font-size: 14pt;
      }

      #yaf_digest .title
      {
      float: left;
      }

      #yaf_digest .top
      {
      border: 1px solid #cbd0d4;
      padding: 4px 40px 4px 40px;
      background-color:#dbe1e5;
      margin:auto;
      width:905px;
      }

      #yaf_digest .bottom
      {
      border: 1px solid #cbd0d4;
      padding: 20px 40px 20px 40px;
      background-color:#dbe1e5;
      margin:auto;
      width:905px;
      font-weight: bold;
      }

      #yaf_digest .date
      {
      float: right;
      color: #999;
      }

      #yaf_digest .emailcontainer
      {
      }
      #yaf_digest .main
      {
      clear: both;
      padding: 5px 15px 15px 15px;
      background-color:#FFFFFF;
      margin:auto;
      overflow:visible;
      width:957px;
      }
      #yaf_digest br
      {
      clear:both;
      }
      #yaf_digest h1.header
      {
      margin-top: 10px;
      background-image:url("titlebg.jpg");
      background-color: #ee6943;
      color:#FFFFFF;
      font-weight:bold;
      padding:8px;
      }
      #yaf_digest .forumTitle
      {
      color: #117711;
      padding: 8px 8px 4px 8px;
      border-bottom: 1px solid #aaa;
      margin-top: 2px;
      margin-bottom: 5px;
      }
      #yaf_digest .topic
      {
      padding-top: 4px;
      padding-left: 25px;
      padding-bottom: 4px;
      }
      #yaf_digest .comments
      {
      padding-left: 15px;
      }
      #yaf_digest .topic h3
      {
      font-size: 12pt;
      padding-bottom: 0px;
      margin-bottom: 0px;
      }
      #yaf_digest .topic a
      {
      text-decoration: underline;
      }
      #yaf_digest .topic h5
      {
      font-size: 9pt;
      padding-top: 0px;
      margin-top: 0px;
      }
      #yaf_digest .topic .shortpost
      {
      background-color: #eee;
      padding: 10px;
      margin-left: 15px;
      margin-right: 15px;
      font-size: 10pt;
      }

      #yaf_digest .topic .link
      {
      display: block;
      font-weight: bold;
      }

      #yaf_digest .topic .by
      {
      display: block;
      color: #999;
      }
      </style>
